titles.title: To require compensation for jury service to be excluded in determining income for purposes of the supplemental security income program under title XVI of the Social Security Act.
To require compensation for jury service to be excluded in determining income for purposes of the supplemental security income program under title XVI of the Social Security Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Requires compensation for jury service to be excluded in determining income for purposes of the Supplemental Security Income program under title XVI of the Social Security Act.
